description: This header file declares validation functions for various 1905.1 and MAP R1/R2/R3 CMDUs used within the RdkEasyMeshController component, related to Open Mesh and Wi-Fi device management.

methods.name: map_validate_topology_discovery
methods.description: Validates a topology discovery CMDU message according to 1905.1 standard.

methods.name: map_validate_topology_query
methods.description: Validates a topology query CMDU message.

methods.name: map_validate_topology_response
methods.description: Validates a topology response CMDU message.

methods.name: map_validate_topology_notification
methods.description: Validates a topology notification CMDU message.

methods.name: map_validate_link_metrics_query
methods.description: Validates link metrics query message for a given ALE.

methods.name: map_validate_link_metrics_response
methods.description: Validates link metrics response message for a given ALE.

methods.name: map_validate_ap_autoconfig_search
methods.description: Validates a MAP R1 autoconfiguration search message.

methods.name: map_validate_ap_autoconfig_wsc
methods.description: Validates an autoconfiguration WSC message.

methods.name: map_validate_vendor_specific
methods.description: Validates a vendor-specific CMDU.

methods.name: map_validate_ack
methods.description: Validates an acknowledgment message in MAP R1.

methods.name: map_validate_ap_capability_report
methods.description: Validates an AP capability report message.

methods.name: map_validate_channel_preference_report
methods.description: Validates a channel preference report message.

methods.name: map_validate_channel_selection_response
methods.description: Validates a channel selection response message.

methods.name: map_validate_operating_channel_report
methods.description: Validates an operating channel report message.

methods.name: map_validate_client_capability_report
methods.description: Validates a client capability report message.

methods.name: map_validate_ap_metrics_response
methods.description: Validates an AP metrics response message.

methods.name: map_validate_assoc_sta_link_metrics_response
methods.description: Validates a response for associated STA link metrics.

methods.name: map_validate_unassoc_sta_link_metrics_response
methods.description: Validates a response for unassociated STA link metrics.

methods.name: map_validate_beacon_metrics_response
methods.description: Validates beacon metrics response.

methods.name: map_validate_client_steering_btm_report
methods.description: Validates client steering BTM report message.

methods.name: map_validate_steering_completed
methods.description: Validates steering completed message.

methods.name: map_validate_backhaul_steering_response
methods.description: Validates backhaul steering response.

methods.name: map_validate_higher_layer_data
methods.description: Validates higher layer data message.

methods.name: map_validate_channel_scan_report
methods.description: Validates a channel scan report.

methods.name: map_validate_assoc_status_notification
methods.description: Validates an association status notification.

methods.name: map_validate_tunneled_msg
methods.description: Validates a tunneled message.

methods.name: map_validate_client_disassoc_stats
methods.description: Validates client disassociation statistics.

methods.name: map_validate_backhaul_sta_capability_report
methods.description: Validates backhaul STA capability report.

methods.name: map_validate_failed_connection
methods.description: Validates a failed connection message.

methods.name: map_validate_proxied_encap_dpp
methods.description: Validates proxied encapsulation DPP message.

methods.name: map_validate_1905_encap_eapol
methods.description: Validates 1905 encapsulated EAPOL message.

methods.name: map_validate_chirp_notification
methods.description: Validates chirp notification message.

methods.name: map_validate_direct_encap_dpp
methods.description: Validates direct encapsulation DPP message.
